column4: guys I copy pasted all ttf fonts of windows into my /usr/share/fonts/truetype/freefont/ and started using them... but all im getting is squares when I use them... i tried fc-cache -v -f , where did i go wrong?
to install windows fonts, adobe flash, codecs, etc: sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
thah only if you use ubuntu-gnome desktop
woah! that easy... damn i wasted time :)
